verses.verse: A Psalm of Asaph. Surely <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Even to such as are <S%H1249>pure<s%> in <S%H3824>heart<s%>.
But as for <S%H7272>me<s%>, my feet were <S%H4592>almost<s%> <S%H5186>gone<s%>; My <S%H838>steps<s%> had well <S%H369>nigh<s%> <S%H8210>slipped<s%>.
For I was <S%H7065>envious<s%> at the <S%H1984>arrogant<s%>, When I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H7965>prosperity<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
For there are no <S%H2784>pangs<s%> in their <S%H4194>death<s%>; But their <S%H193>strength<s%> is <S%H1277>firm<s%>.
They are not in <S%H5999>trouble<s%> as other <S%H582>men<s%>; Neither are they <S%H5060>plagued<s%> <S%H5973>like<s%> other <S%H120>men<s%>.
Therefore <S%H1346>pride<s%> is as a <S%H6059>chain<s%> about their <S%H2555>neck<s%>; Violence <S%H5848>covereth<s%> them as a <S%H7897>garment<s%>.
Their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> stand <S%H3318>out<s%> with <S%H2459>fatness<s%>: They have <S%H5674>more<s%> than <S%H3824>heart<s%> could <S%H4906>wish<s%>.
They <S%H4167>scoff<s%>, and in <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> <S%H1696>utter<s%> <S%H6233>oppression<s%>: They <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H4791>loftily<s%>.
They have <S%H8371>set<s%> their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, And their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1980>walketh<s%> through the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
Therefore his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H1988>hither<s%>: And <S%H4325>waters<s%> of a <S%H4392>full<s%> cup are drained by <S%H4680>them<s%>.
And they <S%H559>say<s%>, How doth <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%>? And is <S%H3426>there<s%> <S%H1844>knowledge<s%> in the Most <S%H5945>High<s%>?
Behold <S%H7563><s%>, these are the wicked; <S%H5769>And<s%>, being alway at <S%H7961>ease<s%>, they <S%H7685>increase<s%> in <S%H2428>riches<s%>.
Surely in <S%H7385>vain<s%> have I <S%H2135>cleansed<s%> my <S%H3824>heart<s%>, And <S%H7364>washed<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> in <S%H5356>innocency<s%>;
For all the <S%H3117>day<s%> long have I been <S%H5060>plagued<s%>, And <S%H8433>chastened<s%> every <S%H1242>morning<s%>.
If I had <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H559>speak<s%> <S%H3644>thus<s%>; <S%H898>Behold<s%>, I had dealt treacherously with the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of thy <S%H1121>children<s%>.
When I <S%H2803>thought<s%> how I might <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H5999>this<s%>, It was too painful for <S%H5869>me<s%>;
Until I <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%>, And <S%H995>considered<s%> their latter <S%H319>end<s%>.
Surely thou <S%H7896>settest<s%> them in slippery <S%H2513>places<s%>: Thou castest them <S%H5307>down<s%> to <S%H4876>destruction<s%>.
How are they become a <S%H8047>desolation<s%> in a <S%H7281>moment<s%>! They are <S%H5486>utterly<s%> <S%H8552>consumed<s%> with <S%H1091>terrors<s%>.
As a <S%H2472>dream<s%> when one <S%H6974>awaketh<s%>, <S%H136>So<s%>, O Lord, when thou <S%H5782>awakest<s%>, thou wilt <S%H959>despise<s%> their <S%H6754>image<s%>.
For my <S%H3824>soul<s%> was <S%H2556>grieved<s%>, And I was <S%H8150>pricked<s%> in my <S%H3629>heart<s%>:
So <S%H1198>brutish<s%> was <S%H3045>I<s%>, and ignorant; I was as a beast before <S%H929>thee<s%>.
Nevertheless I am <S%H8548>continually<s%> with <S%H270>thee<s%>: Thou hast holden my <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
Thou wilt <S%H5148>guide<s%> me with thy <S%H6098>counsel<s%>, And <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3947>receive<s%> me to <S%H3519>glory<s%>.
Whom have I in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> but <S%H776>thee<s%>? And there is none upon earth that I desire besides <S%H2654>thee<s%>.
My <S%H7607>flesh<s%> and my <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H3615>faileth<s%>; But <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H6697>strength<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart<s%> and my <S%H2506>portion<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
For <S%H7369><s%>, lo, they that are far from thee shall <S%H6>perish<s%>: Thou hast <S%H6789>destroyed<s%> all them that play the <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, departing from thee.

But <S%H589><s%> it is <S%H2896>good<s%> for me to draw <S%H7132>near<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>: I have <S%H7896>made<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%> my <S%H4268>refuge<s%>, That I may <S%H5608>tell<s%> of all thy <S%H4399>works<s%>.
